global.title: Orbital
global.browsehappy: You are using an outdated browser. Please upgrade your browser to improve your experience.

description.header: This is high-performance vert.x based distributed java game server designed for realtime indie multiplayers development
description.secondary-header: Project is in active development. Looking for contributors and sponsors to make this stuff widely used in future

features.title: Features:
features.geometry: 2D/3D geometry, lucene/JTS-based spatial indices and collision detection
features.monitor: Micrometer + prometheus metrics and cluster monitor web page

backlog.title: Backlog:
backlog.tests: Unit and module tests since stable versions
backlog.advanced-management: Advanced room management, player management, admin page
backlog.auth: Auth-protected REST API and social accounts oidc providers (google,vk,facebook,X etc...)

core.title: Core description:
core.description: The solution is designed for indie battle-royale games development. It is based on Vert.X "Actor" approach and EventBus features. It allows to have Indefinite amount of room management verticles as workers to process game messages. The code of "Orbital" is conceived to be extended and modernized on your own. The basic features are verticles and managers encapsulating business logic of the game. Following image represents internal framework architecture

examples.title: Examples
examples.instances: Orbital microcluster with gateway verticle and N room verticles

authenticated.suffix:
, you can try the default accounts:
- Administrator (login="admin" and password="admin")
- User (login="user" and password="user").
